reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the collection of data.
reply.reference: This policy describes our privacy practices – what Personal Information we collect about our Users, what we do with it, how we share it, and your rights regarding that Personal Information. By accessing or using any of our Services, you acknowledge that you have read this Privacy Policy. URL: https://www.wix.com/about/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Personal and online identifiers, Commercial and transactions information, Record-keeping information, Internet or other electronic network activity information, Non-precise Geolocation data (IP address), Audio, electronic, visual, or similar information, Inferences drawn from the above information.

content: Internet or other electronic network activity information
Audio, electronic, visual, or similar information
Inferences drawn from the above information

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the various types of data collected, including personal and online identifiers, commercial information, network activity information, geolocation data, audio and visual information, and inferences from collected information.
reply.reference: Personal and online identifiers, Commercial and transactions information, Record-keeping information, Internet or other electronic network activity information, Non-precise Geolocation data (IP address), Audio, electronic, visual, or similar information, Inferences drawn from the above information. URL: https://www.wix.com/about/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy document states that Personal Information is collected in order to provide services, covering data sources and use cases, indicating the declaration of the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: To provide our Services, we collect Personal Information about our Users. The Personal Information comes from you when you visit or use our services, Personal Information we collect automatically, and Personal Information we collect from other sources. URL: https://www.wix.com/about/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the right to request the deletion of personal information collected by the app, and they have the right to opt-out of data collection.
reply.reference: Upon your request, we will delete the personal information we have collected from you. Please follow the instructions provided in this Help Center article: 'Permanently Deleting Your Wix Account', which explains how to delete your Personal Information. URL: https://www.wix.com/about/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties including affiliates, Third Party Service Providers, social media platforms, advertising partners, analytics partners, and promotional partners.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares data with various categories of third parties, including affiliates, service providers, and partners. This sharing of data with third parties is explicitly mentioned in the document.
reply.reference: In the past 12 months, we may have disclosed each of the categories of personal information listed above to our affiliates, Third Party Service Providers, social media platforms, advertising partners, analytics partners, and promotional partners. URL: https://www.wix.com/about/privacy
